Literature.Title: A novel polymyxin derivative that lacks the fatty acid tail and carries only three positive charges has strong synergism with agents excluded by the intact outer membrane.
Literature.Author: Vaara M, Siikanen O, Apajalahti J, Fox JW, Frimodt-Møller N, He H, Poudyal A, Li J, Nation RL, Vaara T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli IH3080(MIC=40µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=40µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 23355(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=84µg/ml)
